Partners

Creatives for social and human rights.

Art and design shape the world around us. It starts conversations. We seek to create an echo of empathy throughour work that shapes how you think about your fellow humans.

We are artists, designers, and creators gathering every month to discuss creativity and social andhuman rights issues shaping the world around us globally and in our communities. Join us for drinks and good times as we figure out whatâ€™s next.
